text: A judge has ordered DMX to be on house arrest with an ankle monitor after he violated the conditions of his bail by failing drug tests. The rapper also left the state of New York without getting permission from the court. A representative for the U. S. Attorney ’ s Office said since his arrest for tax evasion, the rapper tested positive for cocaine not once, but four times, and was caught with marijuana in his system twice. The representative added DMX claimed he could be drug - free on his own after the government offered him to take drug addiction counseling. Also, in July, authorities contacted the rapper, and he told them he was in Chicago.
